title: A briefe declaration of the sacraments expressing the fyrst oryginall how they came vp, a[n]d were institute with the true and mooste syncere meaning and vnderstandyng of the same very necessarye for all men, that wyl not erre in the true vse and receauing therof. Compyled by the godly learned man Wyllyam Tyndall.
author: Tyndale, William, d. 1536.
publisher: By Robert Stoughton. Dwellynge within Ludgate, at the sygne of the Bisshoppes Miter,
notes: Originally published as "A friutefull and godly treatise expressing the right institution and usage of the sacramentes". No copy of this original edition survives.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
